service.title: HTTP Alternate Services
service.documentation: This document introduces "alternate services" to allow an HTTP origin's resources to be available at a seperate network location, possibly accessed with a different protocol configuration. It also specifies one means of discovering alternate services, the "Alt-Svc" header field.

http-header.documentation: A HTTP(S) origin server can advertise the availability of alternate services to HTTP/1.1 and HTTP/2.0 clients by adding an Alt-Svc header field to responses.
